```py
>>> df = pd.DataFrame({'a': [1, 2], 'b': [2, 3]}, index=['tiger', 'zebra'])
>>> df
 a   b
tiger  1   2
zebra  2   3
>>> df.median()
a   1.5
b   2.5
dtype: float64 
```

```py
>>> df = pd.DataFrame({'a': [1, 2], 'b': ['T', 'Z']},
...                   index=['tiger', 'zebra'])
>>> df.median(numeric_only=True)
a   1.5
dtype: float64 
```
